response.overview: Dolly is a porcelain-like doll longing for companionship. She brings a male doll to life through her obsessive rituals, but when he refuses to reciprocate her affection, he violently shatters her form and escapes. Heartbroken and desperate, she pursues the now-living man into the real world, where she attempts to reclaim him.
response.title: Living Dolls
